item.title: #en @ 1471167972467253249
item.description:
In open source software, it seems to me like the clear favorite for friendliest, most bullet-proof license is Apache 2.0. Few people complain when they see a library licensed under Apache 2.0.
What is the equivalent for open data? CC BY 4.0? Something else?
